caption.p: Scheme S1: synthesis of 1,4-dihydropyridine (1,4-DHP) amphiphiles 1– 7, 9– 22, and 26. Scheme S2: synthesis of unsymmetrical 1,4-DHP amphiphile 23. Scheme S3: synthesis of 3,4-dihydro-2(1 H)-pyridone (DHPDO) amphiphiles 28– 38. Scheme S4: synthesis of 2-amino-3-alkoxycarbonylalkylammonium halides 39– 48. Physicochemical characterization of new compounds is provided.
